data.message: I thought of wrirting a song and u getting impressed  had a whole dramatic scenerio in my mind but everybody here loves you i m no stan i m not a crazy fan i m a fuking inspired man inspired by you dont know whether i will ever got to meet you or not.Want to learn rapping like u.i try but i m not as good as you.today u r my idol but i will work hard till the day u wll bcm my rival.This money shit i dont have.so cant even think of stepping outside India and coming to detroit.thnx for inspiring all of us.If u ever get to see this just  inbox me.seeya rap God
